welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Galliate, a charming city nestled in the heart of Italy. Known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and friendly locals, we invite you to immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and explore the wonders of Galliate!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main and largest terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, mainly serving low-cost and charter airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network for up to 4 hours per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
